examples.title: Default
examples.description: A basic resource item with its details filled in at the point of use.

examples.title: With media
examples.description: The media element can hold an [avatar](https://polaris.shopify.com/components/avatar), [thumbnail](https://polaris.shopify.com/components/thumbnail), or other small-format graphic.

examples.title: With shortcut actions
examples.description: Shortcut actions present popular actions from the resource’s details page for easy access. A shortcut action should be available on every item in the list.

examples.title: With vertical alignment
examples.description: Use to adjust the vertical alignment of item content.

examples.title: Default
With media
With shortcut actions
With vertical alignment

pageProps.seoDescription: Resource items represent specific objects within a collection, such as products or orders. They provide contextual information on the resource type and link to the object’s detail page.

PropsWithUrl.name: PropsWithUrl

members.name: url
members.description: URL for the resource’s details page (required unless onClick is provided)

members.name: onClick
members.description: Callback when clicked (required if url is omitted)

members.name: accessibilityLabel
members.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers used for item link

members.name: name
members.description: Individual item name used by various text labels

members.name: ariaControls
members.description: Id of the element the item onClick controls

members.name: ariaExpanded
members.description: Tells screen reader the controlled element is expanded

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier for the item

members.name: media
members.description: Content for the media area at the left of the item, usually an Avatar or Thumbnail

members.name: persistActions
members.description: Makes the shortcut actions always visible

members.name: shortcutActions
members.description: 1 or 2 shortcut actions; must be available on the page linked to by url

members.name: sortOrder
members.description: The order the item is rendered

members.name: external
members.description: Allows url to open in a new tab

members.name: children
members.description: Content for the details area

members.name: verticalAlignment
members.description: Adjust vertical alignment of elements

members.name: dataHref
members.description: Prefetched url attribute to bind to the main element being returned

members.name: onMouseOver
members.description: Callback when mouse cursor is on item

members.name: onMouseOut
members.description: Callback when mouse cursor leaves item

ThumbnailProps.name: ThumbnailProps

members.name: size
members.description: Size of thumbnail

members.name: source
members.description: URL for the image

members.name: alt
members.description: Alt text for the thumbnail image

members.name: transparent
members.description: Transparent background

AvatarProps.name: AvatarProps

members.name: size
members.description: Size of avatar

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the person

members.name: initials
members.description: Initials of person to display

members.name: customer
members.description: Whether the avatar is for a customer

members.name: source
members.description: URL of the avatar image which falls back to initials if the image fails to load

members.name: onError
members.description: Callback fired when the image fails to load

members.name: accessibilityLabel
members.description: Accessible label for the avatar image

DisableableAction.name: DisableableAction

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether or not the action is disabled

members.name: id
members.description: A unique identifier for the action

members.name: content
members.description: Content the action displays

members.name: accessibilityLabel
members.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers

members.name: url
members.description: A destination to link to, rendered in the action

members.name: external
members.description: Forces url to open in a new tab

members.name: target
members.description: Where to display the url

members.name: onAction
members.description: Callback when an action takes place

members.name: onMouseEnter
members.description: Callback when mouse enter

members.name: onTouchStart
members.description: Callback when element is touched
